title: ElasticSearchConfiguration
description: This schema defines the Elastic Search Configuration.

searchIndexMappingLanguage.description: This schema defines the language options available for search index mappings.

host.description: Elastic Search Host. Supports single host or comma-separated list for multiple hosts (e.g., 'localhost' or 'es-node1:9200,es-node2:9200,es-node3:9200').

port.description: Elastic Search port. Used when host does not include port. Ignored when using comma-separated hosts with ports.

maxConnTotal.description: Maximum total connections in the connection pool across all hosts

maxConnPerRoute.description: Maximum connections per host/route in the connection pool

payLoadSize.description: Payload size in bytes depending on elasticsearch config

clusterAlias.description: Alias for search indexes to provide segregation of indexes.

searchType.description: This enum defines the search Type elastic/open search.

aws.description: AWS IAM authentication configuration for OpenSearch. IAM auth is automatically enabled when region is configured. Uses standard AWS environment variables (AWS_DEFAULT_REGION, AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID, AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY, AWS_SESSION_TOKEN).

serviceName.description: AWS service name for signing (es for Elasticsearch/OpenSearch, aoss for OpenSearch Serverless)

naturalLanguageSearch.description: Configuration for natural language search capabilities

enabled.description: Enable or disable natural language search

embeddingProvider.description: The provider to use for generating vector embeddings (e.g., bedrock, openai).

providerClass.description: Fully qualified class name of the NLQService implementation to use

bedrock.description: AWS Bedrock configuration for natural language processing

awsConfig.description: AWS credentials configuration for Bedrock service

modelId.description: Bedrock model identifier to use for query transformation

embeddingModelId.description: Bedrock embedding model identifier to use for vector search

djl.description: Embedding generation using Deep Java Library (DJL)

embeddingModel.description: DJL model name for embedding generation
